commands.name: :%s/foo/bar/g
commands.use: Find and replace all foo with bar

commands.name: S-i # Esc
commands.use: C-v and select until last line. Use above and add # to each line.

commands.name: d}
commands.use: delete to the end of the paragraph

commands.name: C-v <select lines> I <enter string>
commands.use: prepend string to all selected lines

commands.name: C-v <select lines> A <enter string>
commands.use: append string to all selected lines

commands.name: :10,20 normal dw
commands.use: delete first word in lines 10 to 20

commands.name: wget -E -H -k -K -p -m -e robots=off <website url>
commands.use: Mirror an entire website with properly linked js/css/media

commands.name: netstat -lnt
commands.use: Display all listening (l) ports that are using tcp (t)

commands.name: hier
commands.use: Man page about linux filesystem hierarchy

commands.name: com > /dev/null 2>&1
commands.use: Drain all shit down the toilet

commands.name: sudo lsof -t -i:5000
commands.use: get pid of app at port 5000

commands.name: sudo update-rc.d -f apache2 disable
commands.use: disable apache2 from running at startup

commands.name: git rebase -i HEAD~2
commands.use: Rebase interactively the last two commits

commands.name: sudo rm -vf /var/lib/apt/lists/*
commands.use: Remove packages list. Later update sys for new one.

commands.name: Streisand effect
commands.use: attempt to hide info has an unintended consequence of publicizing it more widely, usually by net

commands.name: Cobra effect
commands.use: where a solution to a problem could actually make it worse

commands.name: foot-in-the-door effect
commands.use: Agree to something little, and you are much more likely to agree to much more.

commands.name: survivorship bias
commands.use: tell stories looking backwards and fit a narrative that makes it all make sense

commands.name: Student Syndrome
commands.use: deliberately apply to an assignment at the last moment to avoid procrastination

commands.name: Cupertino effect
commands.use: tendency of spell-checker to autocorrect a miss-spelled word with the wrong word

commands.name: Impostor Syndrome
commands.use: people that think they are frauds and do not deserve the success they have achieved

commands.name: Semantic Satiation
commands.use: A word to lose its meaning for a listener, after being repeated a lot many times

commands.name: docker run -i -t <image id> /bin/bash
commands.use: run docker image in interactive shell (-i), allocate a pseudo-TTY

commands.name: docker build -t "<repo>:<tag>" .
commands.use: build image from Dockerfile in CWD. Add <repo> name and <tag>

commands.name: docker run -it -v <host_dir>:<container_dir> <image> /bin/bash
commands.use: connects host_dir to container_dir, if <container_dir> does not exist, it'll be created
